detectors.description: OaxacaProtocol.randomly() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x6d58686571ba831947869c326825b60d99a20c1c-OaxacaProtocol.sol#440-444) uses a weak PRNG: screen (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x6d58686571ba831947869c326825b60d99a20c1c-OaxacaProtocol.sol#443)

OaxacaProtocol.randomly() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x6d58686571ba831947869c326825b60d99a20c1c-OaxacaProtocol.sol#440-444) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: screen = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(now,msg.sender,cabosanlucas))) % 50 (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x6d58686571ba831947869c326825b60d99a20c1c-OaxacaProtocol.sol#441)
